about_the_game:
STORY

For years, there have been reports of people going missing around a secluded spot deep in the Virginia wilderness. Local legend tells of a mysterious feral woman who stalks the woods at night, looking for unsuspecting victims. For years she was thought to be just a myth. Until now...

While searching for the fabled "Widow of the Woods" during an investigation, you stumble across a cabin in the middle of seemingly nowhere. Trapped inside, you must survive for five nights until the police can get to your location. Armed with nothing but a flashlight and a couple of trail cameras set up around the perimeter, you must avoid the clutches of the terrifying widow before it's too late.



FEATURES

  • Point and click gameplay. Click the screen to turn your flashlight on and off. Leave it off for too long and the widow might find you! Select the different trail cameras to watch for any signs of activity outside the cabin, if you dare...
  • Manage your resources! You only have a limited amount of battery power. Having your flashlight on and viewing the camera feed will drain your battery. Conserve power or you'll suffer a power outage and risk the wrath of the widow.
  • An immersive horror experience with a tense atmosphere, rich sound design and a thrilling backstory. Whether it's the frightening voice of a whisper in the dark or the chilling image of a figure at the window, Night at the Cabin is designed to keep you on the edge of your seat!


This game contains frightening images and jump scares.
